alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Morgan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 4:35PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weld and west central Morgan Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near LaSalle to near Hudson, or along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Greeley to 28 miles northeast of Denver. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Greeley, Brighton, Evans, Fort Lupton, Lochbuie, Hudson, LaSalle, Kersey, Keenesburg, Gilcrest, Prospect Valley, Riverside Reservoir, Milton Reservoir, Roggen and Gill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
